typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Plan_Benefit_ID as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date as string,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Description as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as integer,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		Benefit_Plan_Type_Code as integer,
		Population_Category_Code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
